title: New to league of legends. I have been told by my team that i just instant lose from champ select.
body: I have watched league of legends on twitch for some time and get how to play the game but people keep telling me that if i first pick some champions ill just auto lose game and this feels true. Yi vs Jax. singed into Nasus feels like i instant lose lane as well or have give him lane but singed doesn't kill him late anyway. Im just wondering if this is the case in league of legends not high elo. Thanks.
